data.eml:eml: Checklist of earthworms (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae) from Montenegro: Diversity and biogeographical review

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stojanović, Mirjana, Milutinović, Tanja (2013): Checklist of earthworms (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae) from Montenegro: Diversity and biogeographical review. Zootaxa 3710 (2): 147-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.2.2
